content: mm us6 30 cm 12 inches for sizes m l xl or 4 mm us6 double-pointed needles join the work to knit in the round and place a marker at the beginning of the round work 9 9 10 10 11 11 rounds in rib k1 p1 you should still have 38 42 48 52 58 64 sts on your needles chest see this section of the video tutorial here change to 5 mm us8 / 30 cm 12 inches for sizes xxs xs s / 5 mm us8 / 40 cm 16 inches circular needles for sizes m l xl or 5 mm us8 double-pointed needles we will now make a raglan increase by working a kfb on either side of the marker round 1 k entire round round 2 kfb k to the last st in the round kfb you should now have 40 44 50 54 60 66 on your needles work rounds 1-2 a total of 8 10 12 14 16 18 times 3 there are now a total of 54 62 72 80 90 100 sts on your needles arm and harness holes see this section of the video tutorial here round 1 knit 2 2 3 3 4 4 kfb bobble 10 11 12 14 15 17 sts begin bobble using the extra st created with the kfb move remaining st from the bobble from the right to the left needle k2tog knit to the last 14 15 17 19 21 23 sts in the round kfb bobble 10 11 12 14 15 17 sts begin bobble using the extra st created with the kfb move remaining st from the bobble from the right to the left needle k2tog knit 2 2 3 3 4 4 round 2 knit 3 3 4 4 5 5 co 10 11 12 14 15 17 sts knit 28 34 40 44 50 56 co 10 11 12 14 15 17 sts knit 3 3 4 4 5 5 round 3 k entire round round 4 knit 24 28 33 37 42 47 kfb bobble 4 sts begin bobble using the extra st created with the kfb move remaining st from the bobble from the right to the left needle k2tog knit to end of the round round 5 knit 25 29 34 38 43 48 co 4 knit to end of the round you should still have a total of 54 62 72 80 90 100 sts on your needles midsection see this section of the video tutorial here work 6 cm 8 cm 10 cm 12 cm 13 cm 15 cm / 2 25 inches 3 inches 4 inches 4 75 inches 5 inches 6 inches in the round in stockinette stitch measured from the arm holes or until you ve reached your desired length based on your dog s length leave 3 cm 1 inch extra for final ribbing midsection ribbing see this section of the video tutorial here place markers in the first and
